sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ConfigService } from '../config.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { data: any; constructor(private configService: ConfigService) {} ngOnInit() { this.configService.getConfig().subscribe((data:any) => { this.data = data; }); } }
